title: Brett Boland from Astronoid
itunes:title: Brett Boland from Astronoid
description:
Hell yes progressive metal, we have Brett Boland who plays in Astronoid hanging with us this week. We talk about the Merrimack Valley scene in Mass, perfectionism and technical metalcore (my personal favorite). Pull up your ear and enjoy! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
